data.comment: Robson (Coritiba) is not on the pitch at the moment but still receives a yellow card.
The first-half is now underway.
Fernando Sobral for Ceara gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 1, Goal kick for Coritiba at Estadio Castelao.
Throw-in for Coritiba in their own half.
In the minute 2, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Goal! Rodrigo Muniz gives Coritiba a 0-1 lead in Fortaleza.
Free kick for Ceara in the half of Coritiba.
Ball safe as Coritiba is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 6, Coritiba have been awarded a corner by Felipe Fernandes de Lima.
Coritiba are pushing forward but Yan Sasse's finish is wide of the goal.
Ceara have a goal kick.
In the minute 7, Throw-in for Ceara in the half of Coritiba.
Goal! Ceara go level at 1-1 through Vinicius Goes in Fortaleza.
That's a fine assist from Leo Chu.
In the minute 9, Coritiba needs to be cautious. Ceara have an attacking throw-in.
Corner awarded to Ceara.
Coritiba awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 12, Felipe Fernandes de Lima awards Ceara a goal kick.
Coritiba have a dangerous throw-in.
Throw-in Coritiba.
In the minute 15, Free kick Ceara.
Ceara's Vinicius Goes breaks free at Estadio Castelao. But the strike goes wide of the post.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Fortaleza.
In the minute 17, Throw-in for Coritiba at Estadio Castelao.
Coritiba drive upfield and Giovanni Augusto gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Ceara defender.
Corner awarded to Coritiba.
In the minute 19, It's a goal kick for the home team in Fortaleza.
Ball goes out of play for a Ceara goal kick.
So close for Ceara as Cleber Bomfim's shot comes back off the post.
In the minute 22, Coritiba have a goal kick.
Felipe Fernandes de Lima signals a free kick to Coritiba.
Felipe Fernandes de Lima awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 23, Felipe Fernandes de Lima awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Coritiba at Estadio Castelao.
Throw-in Coritiba.
In the minute 25, Can Ceara get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Coritiba's half?
In Fortaleza a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Vinicius Goes gets his shot on target but fails to score for Ceara.
In the minute 26, Ceara have been awarded a corner by Felipe Fernandes de Lima.
Felipe Fernandes de Lima awards Ceara a goal kick.
Felipe Fernandes de Lima signals a free kick to Coritiba in their own half.
In the minute 28, Cleber Bomfim of Ceara is pulled up for offside.
Felipe Fernandes de Lima signals a free kick to Coritiba.
Can Coritiba capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Ceara's half?
In the minute 29, In Fortaleza a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Pedro Naressi (Ceara) has received a first yellow card.
Important block from the Ceara defence as Robson fires in a strike for Coritiba.
In the minute 31, Throw-in for Ceara in their own half.
Free kick for Ceara in the half of Coritiba.
Ceara have been awarded a corner by Felipe Fernandes de Lima.
In the minute 33, Ceara's Vinicius Goes misses with an attempt on goal.
Goal kick for Coritiba at Estadio Castelao.
Ball safe as Coritiba is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 37, Throw-in for Ceara close to the penalty box.
Attention is being given to Coritibaâ€™s Matheus Galdezani and play has been suspended briefly.
Coritiba's Matheus Galdezani is back in action after a slight knock.
In the minute 39, Free kick for Coritiba in their own half.
Corner awarded to Coritiba.
Felipe Fernandes de Lima signals a Coritiba throw-in in Ceara's half.
In the minute 42, Coritiba to take a throw-in in Ceara territory.
Coritiba drive forward but Robson is judged offside.
Ceara have been awarded a corner by Felipe Fernandes de Lima.
In the minute 43, Eduardo Brock (Ceara) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
Felipe Fernandes de Lima awards Coritiba a goal kick.
Free kick Coritiba.
In the minute 45, Coritiba awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Can Coritiba get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Ceara's half?
Felipe Fernandes de Lima signals a Coritiba throw-in in Ceara's half.
In the minute 45, Corner awarded to Coritiba.
Felipe Fernandes de Lima will wait an extra 2 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 1st half.
Free kick for Coritiba in the half of Ceara.
In the minute 45, Ceara awarded a free kick in their own half.
The first half has been concluded at Estadio Castelao.
The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
In the minute 46, Free kick for Coritiba in their own half.
Fabinho is on a sub for Pedro Naressi for Ceara.
The away team replace Yan Sasse with Nathan.
In the minute 47, Coritiba have a goal kick.
Coritiba awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Fortaleza Coritiba drive forward through Nathan. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 48, Felipe Fernandes de Lima signals a free kick to Ceara in their own half.
Throw-in for Coritiba at Estadio Castelao.
Throw-in high up the field for Coritiba in Fortaleza.
In the minute 50, Felipe Fernandes de Lima signals a free kick to Ceara in their own half.
Throw-in Coritiba.
Coritiba awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 52, Eduardo is on target to give Ceara a 2-1 advantage.
Coritiba awarded a free kick in their own half.
Nathan for Coritiba drives towards goal at Estadio Castelao. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 55, Coritiba have been awarded a corner by Felipe Fernandes de Lima.
Corner awarded to Coritiba.
Coritiba have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 56, Free kick for Ceara in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Coritiba in the half of Ceara.
In the minute 59, Sabino of Coritiba gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a Ceara goal kick.
Coritiba's Robson is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 59, It's a goal kick for the away team in Fortaleza.
Coritiba are coming forward and William Matheus gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Ceara goal kick.
Ball safe as Coritiba is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 61, Ricardo Oliveira is replacing Rodrigo Muniz for the away team.
Ricardo Oliveira of Coritiba smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 63, Throw-in high up the field for Coritiba in Fortaleza.
Coritiba's Matheus Galdezani misses with an attempt on goal.
Ceara have a goal kick.
In the minute 64, Coritiba awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Fortaleza a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Charles is booked for the home team.
In the minute 65, Guto Ferreira (Ceara) is making a second substitution, with Saulo replacing Cleber Bomfim.
Ceara drives forward and Eduardo gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Throw-in for Ceara close to the penalty box.
In the minute 68, Throw-in for Coritiba in their own half.
Free kick Coritiba.
Felipe Fernandes de Lima signals a throw-in for Coritiba, close to Ceara's area.
In the minute 69, Ceara to take a throw-in in Coritiba territory.
Corner awarded to Ceara.
Felipe Fernandes de Lima awards Coritiba a goal kick.
In the minute 70, Felipe Fernandes de Lima signals a free kick to Coritiba.
Coritiba have been awarded a corner by Felipe Fernandes de Lima.
Felipe Fernandes de Lima signals a free kick to Ceara in their own half.
In the minute 72, Can Coritiba get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Ceara's half?
Free kick for Coritiba in their own half.
Free kick Coritiba.
Throw-in for Coritiba in the half of Ceara.
Free kick for Ceara in their own half.
In the minute 75, Coritiba make their third substitution with Ezequiel Cerutti replacing Robson.
In the minute 76, Felipe Fernandes de Lima awards the home team a throw-in.
Vinicius Lima is replacing Fernando Sobral for Ceara at Estadio Castelao.
In the minute 77, Ceara to take a throw-in in Coritiba territory.
Guto Ferreira is making the team's fourth substitution at Estadio Castelao with Kelvyn Ramos da Fonseca replacing Leo Chu.
Coritiba awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in Ceara.
In the minute 79, Felipe Fernandes de Lima signals a Coritiba throw-in in Ceara's half.
The away team have replaced Matheus Galdezani with Gabriel Santana. This is the fourth substitution made today by Jorginho.
Felipe Fernandes de Lima signals a free kick to Coritiba in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 80, The away team have replaced Matheus Bueno with Ramon Martinez. This is the fifth substitution made today by Jorginho.
Goal kick for Ceara at Estadio Castelao.
In the minute 82, Throw-in for Ceara in the half of Coritiba.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Fortaleza.
Can Coritiba capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Ceara's half?
In the minute 84, Free kick for Coritiba in the half of Ceara.
Ceara to take a throw-in in Coritiba territory.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 85, Coritiba awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Felipe Fernandes de Lima signals a free kick to Coritiba in their own half.
Guto Ferreira (Ceara) is making a fifth substitution, with Wescley replacing Vinicius Goes.
In the minute 87, Coritiba have been awarded a corner by Felipe Fernandes de Lima.
Felipe Fernandes de Lima signals a free kick to Coritiba just outside Ceara's area.
Ball goes out of play for a Ceara goal kick.
In the minute 89, Coritiba awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Coritiba get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Ceara's half?
Ceara needs to be cautious. Coritiba have an attacking throw-in.
The fourth official's board shows 5 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
Felipe Fernandes de Lima signals a Coritiba throw-in in Ceara's half.
Throw-in for Ceara at Estadio Castelao.
Ceara to take a throw-in in Coritiba territory.
Throw-in for Coritiba in their own half.
Free kick for Ceara in their own half.
Free kick for Ceara in their own half.
The match is over. Final score 2-1.
Alyson Vinicius Almeida Neves (Ceara) gets a yellow card.
